edu.controller

Class ControllerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.controller.ControllerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ControllerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Clase que permite controlar y unificar la parte logica con la parte grafica.
